sourcesContent:
<form (ngSubmit)="submit()">

    <input name="name" type="text" placeholder="userName" [(ngModel)]="userObject.firstName">
    <input name="lastname" type="text" placeholder="userLstName" [(ngModel)]="userObject.lastName">
    <select name="status" [(ngModel)]="userObject.status">
        <option value="active">active</option>
        <option value="noactive">noactive</option>
    </select>

    <button type="submit">add user</button>
</form>
